ai-tha-ap389:1.2_0: like the moon in the waxing fortnight.
ai-tha-ap389:1.4_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap389:2.1_0: I’ll fall the fruit of the roots
ai-tha-ap389:2.4_0: I paid homage and went forth.
ai-tha-ap389:3.2_0: I used to be a fruit.
ai-tha-ap389:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap389:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap389:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakutthā.
ai-tha-ap389:8.1_0: (Once) the seventh Rains Retreat in) the seventh,
